org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.query

Interface GridQueryIndexing


  • public interface GridQueryIndexing
    Abstraction for internal indexing implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IndexingQueryFilter backupFilter(AffinityTopologyVersion topVer, int[] parts)
      Returns backup filter.
      void cancelAllQueries()
      Cancels all executing queries.
      void cancelQueries(Collection<Long> queries)
      Cancel specified queries.
      void checkStatementStreamable(PreparedStatement nativeStmt)
      Check if passed statement is insert statement eligible for streaming, throw an IgniteSQLException if not.
      void dynamicAddColumn(String schemaName, String tblName, List<QueryField> cols, boolean ifTblExists, boolean ifColNotExists)
      Add columns to dynamic table.
      void dynamicDropColumn(String schemaName, String tblName, List<String> cols, boolean ifTblExists, boolean ifColExists)
      Drop columns from dynamic table.
      void dynamicIndexCreate(String schemaName, String tblName, QueryIndexDescriptorImpl idxDesc, boolean ifNotExists, SchemaIndexCacheVisitor cacheVisitor)
      Create new index locally.
      void dynamicIndexDrop(String schemaName, String idxName, boolean ifExists)
      Remove index from the cache.
      void markForRebuildFromHash(String cacheName)
      Marks all indexes of given type for rebuild from hash index, making them unusable until rebuild finishes.
      void onDisconnected(IgniteFuture<?> reconnectFut)
      Client disconnected callback.
      PreparedStatement prepareNativeStatement(String schemaName, String sql)
      Prepare native statement to retrieve JDBC metadata from.

      Parses SQL query into two step query and executes it.

      Executes regular query.

      Queries individual fields (generally used by JDBC drivers).

      Executes text query.

        busyLock - Busy lock.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

   throws IgniteCheckedException
        Stops indexing.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • queryDistributedSql

        <K,V> QueryCursor<javax.cache.Cache.Entry<K,V>> queryDistributedSql(String schemaName,
                                                                    String cacheName,
                                                                    SqlQuery qry,
                                                                    boolean keepBinary)
                                                             throws IgniteCheckedException
        Parses SQL query into two step query and executes it.
        Parameters:
        schemaName - Schema name.
        cacheName - Cache name.
        qry - Query.
        keepBinary - Keep binary flag.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • querySqlFields

        List<FieldsQueryCursor<List<?>>> querySqlFields(String schemaName,
                                                SqlFieldsQuery qry,
                                                SqlClientContext cliCtx,
                                                boolean keepBinary,
                                                boolean failOnMultipleStmts,
                                                GridQueryCancel cancel)
        Detect whether SQL query should be executed in distributed or local manner and execute it.
        Parameters:
        schemaName - Schema name.
        qry - Query.
        cliCtx - Client context.
        keepBinary - Keep binary flag.
        failOnMultipleStmts - Whether an exception should be thrown for multiple statements query.
        cancel - Query cancel state handler. @return Cursor.

      • streamUpdateQuery

        long streamUpdateQuery(String schemaName,
                       String qry,
                       @Nullable
                       Object[] params,
                       IgniteDataStreamer<?,?> streamer)
                throws IgniteCheckedException
        Execute an INSERT statement using data streamer as receiver.
        Parameters:
        schemaName - Schema name.
        qry - Query.
        params - Query parameters.
        streamer - Data streamer to feed data to.
        Returns:
        Update counter.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

                                    SqlClientContext cliCtx)
                             throws IgniteCheckedException
        Execute a batched INSERT statement using data streamer as receiver.
        Parameters:
        schemaName - Schema name.
        qry - Query.
        params - Query parameters.
        cliCtx - Client connection context.
        Returns:
        Update counters.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • queryLocalSql

                                                              SqlQuery qry,
                                                              IndexingQueryFilter filter,
                                                              boolean keepBinary)
                                                       throws IgniteCheckedException
        Executes regular query.
        Parameters:
        schemaName - Schema name.
        cacheName - Cache name.
        qry - Query.
        filter - Cache name and key filter.
        keepBinary - Keep binary flag. @return Cursor.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException

      • queryLocalSqlFields

        FieldsQueryCursor<List<?>> queryLocalSqlFields(String schemaName,
                                               SqlFieldsQuery qry,
                                               boolean keepBinary,
                                               IndexingQueryFilter filter,
                                               GridQueryCancel cancel)
                                        throws IgniteCheckedException
        Queries individual fields (generally used by JDBC drivers).
        Parameters:
        schemaName - Schema name.
        qry - Query.
        keepBinary - Keep binary flag.
        filter - Cache name and key filter.
        cancel - Query cancel.
        Returns:
        Cursor.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException

      • queryLocalText

        <K,V> GridCloseableIterator<IgniteBiTuple<K,V>> queryLocalText(String schemaName,
                                                               String cacheName,
                                                               String qry,
                                                               String typeName,
                                                               IndexingQueryFilter filter)
                                                        throws IgniteCheckedException
        Executes text query.
        Parameters:
        schemaName - Schema name.
        cacheName - Cache name.
        qry - Text query.
        typeName - Type name.
        filter - Cache name and key filter. @return Queried rows.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • dynamicIndexCreate

        void dynamicIndexCreate(String schemaName,
                        String tblName,
                        QueryIndexDescriptorImpl idxDesc,
                        boolean ifNotExists,
                        SchemaIndexCacheVisitor cacheVisitor)
                 throws IgniteCheckedException
        Create new index locally.
        Parameters:
        schemaName - Schema name.
        tblName - Table name.
        idxDesc - Index descriptor.
        ifNotExists - Ignore operation if index exists (instead of throwing an error).
        cacheVisitor - Cache visitor
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - if failed.

      • dynamicIndexDrop

        void dynamicIndexDrop(String schemaName,
                      String idxName,
                      boolean ifExists)
               throws IgniteCheckedException
        Remove index from the cache.
        Parameters:
        schemaName - Schema name.
        idxName - Index name.
        ifExists - Ignore operation if index does not exist (instead of throwing an error).
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • dynamicAddColumn

        void dynamicAddColumn(String schemaName,
                      String tblName,
                      List<QueryField> cols,
                      boolean ifTblExists,
                      boolean ifColNotExists)
               throws IgniteCheckedException
        Add columns to dynamic table.
        Parameters:
        schemaName - Schema name.
        tblName - Table name.
        cols - Columns to add.
        ifTblExists - Ignore operation if target table does not exist (instead of throwing an error).
        ifColNotExists - Ignore operation if column already exists (instead of throwing an error) - is honored only for single column case.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • dynamicDropColumn

        void dynamicDropColumn(String schemaName,
                       String tblName,
                       List<String> cols,
                       boolean ifTblExists,
                       boolean ifColExists)
                throws IgniteCheckedException
        Drop columns from dynamic table.
        Parameters:
        schemaName - Schema name.
        tblName - Table name.
        cols - Columns to drop.
        ifTblExists - Ignore operation if target table does not exist (instead of throwing an error).
        ifColExists - Ignore operation if column does not exist (instead of throwing an error) - is honored only for single column case.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • registerCache

        void registerCache(String cacheName,
                   String schemaName,
                   GridCacheContext<?,?> cctx)
            throws IgniteCheckedException
        Registers cache.
        Parameters:
        cacheName - Cache name.
        schemaName - Schema name.
        cctx - Cache context.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • unregisterCache

        void unregisterCache(GridCacheContext cctx,
                     boolean rmvIdx)
              throws IgniteCheckedException
        Unregisters cache.
        Parameters:
        cctx - Cache context.
        rmvIdx - If true, will remove index.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed to drop cache schema.

      • registerType

        boolean registerType(GridCacheContext cctx,
                     GridQueryTypeDescriptor desc)
              throws IgniteCheckedException
        Registers type if it was not known before or updates it otherwise.
        Parameters:
        cctx - Cache context.
        desc - Type descriptor.
        Returns:
        True if type was registered, false if for some reason it was rejected.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • store

        void store(GridCacheContext cctx,
           GridQueryTypeDescriptor type,
           CacheDataRow row,
           CacheDataRow prevRow,
           boolean prevRowAvailable)
    throws IgniteCheckedException
        Updates index. Note that key is unique for cache, so if cache contains multiple indexes the key should be removed from indexes other than one being updated.
        Parameters:
        cctx - Cache context.
        type - Type descriptor.
        row - New row.
        prevRow - Previous row.
        prevRowAvailable - Whether previous row is available.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • remove

        void remove(GridCacheContext cctx,
            GridQueryTypeDescriptor type,
            CacheDataRow row)
     throws IgniteCheckedException
        Removes index entry by key.
        Parameters:
        cctx - Cache context.
        type - Type descriptor.
        row - Row.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • rebuildIndexesFromHash

        void rebuildIndexesFromHash(String cacheName)
                     throws IgniteCheckedException
        Rebuilds all indexes of given type from hash index.
        Parameters:
        cacheName - Cache name.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • markForRebuildFromHash

        void markForRebuildFromHash(String cacheName)
        Marks all indexes of given type for rebuild from hash index, making them unusable until rebuild finishes.
        Parameters:
        cacheName - Cache name.

      • backupFilter

        IndexingQueryFilter backupFilter(AffinityTopologyVersion topVer,
                                 int[] parts)
        Returns backup filter.
        Parameters:
        topVer - Topology version.
        parts - Partitions.
        Returns:
        Backup filter.

      • onDisconnected

        void onDisconnected(IgniteFuture<?> reconnectFut)
        Client disconnected callback.
        Parameters:
        reconnectFut - Reconnect future.

      • prepareNativeStatement

        PreparedStatement prepareNativeStatement(String schemaName,
                                         String sql)
                                  throws SQLException
        Prepare native statement to retrieve JDBC metadata from.
        Parameters:
        schemaName - Schema name.
        sql - Query.
        Returns:
        PreparedStatement from underlying engine to supply metadata to Prepared - most likely H2.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • runningQueries

        Collection<GridRunningQueryInfo> runningQueries(long duration)
        Collect queries that already running more than specified duration.
        Parameters:
        duration - Duration to check.
        Returns:
        Collection of long running queries.

      • cancelQueries

        void cancelQueries(Collection<Long> queries)
        Cancel specified queries.
        Parameters:
        queries - Queries ID's to cancel.

      • cancelAllQueries

        void cancelAllQueries()
        Cancels all executing queries.

      • schema

        String schema(String cacheName)
        Gets database schema from cache name.
        Parameters:
        cacheName - Cache name. null would be converted to an empty string.
        Returns:
        Schema name. Should not be null since we should not fail for an invalid cache name.

      • checkStatementStreamable

        void checkStatementStreamable(PreparedStatement nativeStmt)
        Check if passed statement is insert statement eligible for streaming, throw an IgniteSQLException if not.
        Parameters:
        nativeStmt - Native statement.

      • rowCacheCleaner

        GridQueryRowCacheCleaner rowCacheCleaner(int cacheGroupId)
        Return row cache cleaner.
        Parameters:
        cacheGroupId - Cache group id.
        Returns:
        Row cache cleaner.
